description: Horses are beautiful creatures. The way they move and the shine of their coat gives them a certain majesty not found in other mammals. With that majesty comes great power and responsibility and horses know it. Training an animal as powerful as a horse is a challenge, regardless of your age, gender, or experience. This guide will teach you, not only the simple tricks, but also to understand the nature of the horse. Whether you have owned horses for years, or are just thinking about buying one and want to know more, this easy to read ebook is perfect for you. This book covers everything you will need to know about horse training including: Horse Buying, Common Mistakes, Tips for Beginners, Teaching Voice Commands, Lead Training, Loading Horses Into Trailers, and much more. Download this great guide today and learn some great methods to train your horse!
